short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will detect if an app or game on the PlayStore has any published reports on fairmobilegames.com

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will detect if an app or game on the PlayStore has any published reports on fairmobilegames.com. You can then visit the FMG app page to make a better decision about installing the app by reading the reviews.
